title: Robotics Workshops
description: Digital Maker workshops for Young People and Families

event.secondHeader: Join us for an exciting session

testimonials: First time I have done this. Great fun.
This was a fun and entertaining way of getting introduced to Computing, as you can see what you have done physically.
We thought that it was engaging and interesting. Its not something that we had really ever done before. So it was fun to learn.
This was a very enjoyable and engaging activity. It has certainly sparked an interest for me in this area.
Enjoyable, new experience. Fun and interactive. It let us be creative.
footerHeader: Book a workshop for your school, youth club (or anywhere else!)
